remarks: Lemma for ~ zlpir .  A nonzero ideal of integers contains some positive integers.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Jan-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ zringlpirlem1 as of 9-Jun-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
zlpirlem.z $e |- Z = ( CCfld |`s ZZ ) $.
zlpirlem.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. ( LIdeal ` Z ) ) $.
zlpirlem.n0 $e |- ( ph -> I =/= { 0 } ) $.
zlpirlem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( I i^i NN ) =/= (/) ) $.
